name: Proxima (CubeBig Studio)
description:
Proxima is a Bullet hell space shooter game with roguelike sensation.

in this game you will control a ship to escape from elien planet named proxima. While on the run you will be chased by the inhabitants of planet proxima, so you have to beat them all and to run from their planet.

Feature

  • 2 space ship with their own ability
  • Many Enemy space ship with their own attack type
  • play co-op with your friends in one device
